head.title: Angel Hair Pasta and Stewed Tomatoes

ing.item: Stewed tomatoes juice from one lemon (small)

directions.step:
Cook pasta. Cook broccoli (steam or boil). Mix pasta, broccoli and rest of ingrediants. Its that easy and tastes great! I'll be having it for lunch today. Shared by Johnathan Adams
From Genie F&W Library FFD9403.TXT Recipes from the Fat Free Digest From Fatfree Digest April-May 1994, Formatting by Sue Smith (using MMCONV)
From Gemini's MASSIVE MealMaster collection at www.synapse.com/~gemini
